Query.SQL: SELECT R.SecCode AS seccode, V.ConsolMktVal AS mcap, V.ValDate AS date FROM qai.dbo.SECMSTRX R JOIN qai.dbo.SECMAPX P ON R.SECCODE=P.SECCODE AND P.VENTYPE=34 and Type_=1 JOIN qai.dbo.Ds2MktVal V ON P.VenCode=V.infocode WHERE ValDate BETWEEN '%START_DATE%' AND '%END_DATE%' AND R.SecCode=%SECCODE%
Query.Description: Look up a market cap by seccode. Query updated to use SECMSTRX/SECMAPX.
